sentence: Rep. Jim Jordan, R-Ohio, told Newsmax on Tuesday that conservatives have a lot of reasons to be confident in a red wave this November, but warned never to be overconfident.
author: Jeremy Frankel
title: Rep. Jordan to Newsmax: Be Confident of Red Wave, but Not Overconfident

sentence: Amid a potential incoming food shortage, Rep. Jim Jordan, R-Ohio, told Newsmax that in every domain, the Biden administration has "screwed things up."
author: Jack Gournell
title: Rep. Jim Jordan to Newsmax: Food Shortage Talks Shows Biden Has 'Screwed Things Up'

sentence: Rep. Jim Jordan to Newsmax: Food Shortage Talks Shows Biden Has 'Screwed Things Up' (Newsmax's "Stinchfield") By Jack Gournell | Monday, 28 March 2022 10:52 PM Amid a potential incoming food shortage, Rep. Jim Jordan, R-Ohio, told Newsmax that in every domain, the Biden administration has "screwed things up."
author: NationalWatch
title: Rep. Jim Jordan to Newsmax: Food Shortage Talks Shows Biden Has ‘Screwed Things Up’
